meanings.definition: To remove or mask unpleasant odors.
meanings.sent1: She deodorizes the room with a scented spray.
meanings.sent2: The air freshener deodorizes the bathroom effectively.
meanings.sent3: The sneaky skunk deodorizes its den with fragrant flowers.
meanings.sent4: His cheerful attitude deodorizes the tense atmosphere.
meanings.sent5: The magical potion deodorizes any foul smell instantly.

meanings.definition: To make something smell fresh and clean.
meanings.sent1: Mom deodorizes the laundry with a floral detergent.
meanings.sent2: The scented candle deodorizes the living room beautifully.
meanings.sent3: The chef deodorizes the kitchen with the aroma of freshly baked bread.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter deodorizes the room, filling it with joy.
meanings.sent5: The gentle breeze deodorizes the garden, carrying the scent of flowers.
